projects.title: Andala.ai - AI Social Media Platform
projects.desc: End-to-end MLOps platform for multimodal content generation (music, video, images). Built scalable inference APIs with PyTorch, Django, and AWS, reducing inference costs by 45% through GPU optimization and caching strategies.

projects.title: LLM-Assisted Learning Platform
projects.desc: AI-powered e-learning platform with LangChain-based retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). Integrated domain-specific LLMs, vector databases, and personalized tutoring agents enabling real-time adaptive learning with sub-second retrieval latency.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.desc: A personal portfolio website built with Next.js and TailwindCSS to showcase my AI/ML projects, qualifications, and technical skills. Features modern design with smooth animations, GitHub API integration, and responsive layout.

projects.title: Streamix - Video Streaming Platform
projects.desc: Netflix-style streaming platform with dynamic content loading, server-side rendering, and optimized caching. Implemented analytics and user behavior tracking for personalized recommendations, reducing page load time by 40%.

projects.title: SpinShot - Multiplayer Gaming Platform
projects.desc: Real-time multiplayer pong game built with WebSocket communication and microservices architecture. Supports hundreds of simultaneous players with minimal latency, featuring chat, matchmaking, and comprehensive testing.

projects.title: Spotify Profile Stats & Dashboard
projects.desc: A Spotify profile stats and dashboard built with Next.js and TailwindCSS. Visualizes listening habits, top artists, tracks, and provides personalized music insights through Spotify API integration.

projects.title: IRC Server Implementation
projects.desc: RFC 1459-compliant IRC server with efficient concurrency and event handling. Implemented message routing, user authentication, and command parsing demonstrating mastery of sockets, multi-threading, and low-level networking.
